channel.title: Rune-Battle Pkz, Fighting Till The End
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/ncmk5k.png[/img]
Forums: [url=http:///www.rune-battle.com]http:///www.rune-battle.com[/url] Webclient: [url=http://www.rune-battle.com/index.php?page=page3295]http://www.rune-battle.com/index.php?page=page3295[/url] Vote: [b]The voting system is being transfered to the new source which is this.[/b]
Welcome to the Re-Posted advertisement thread of Rune-Battle Pkz, I have changed the source and did alot of recent updates, the new source is being worked on still. But available for everyone to play. The Source and client are being improved daily and tons of updates to come. We are looking forward to seeing many new players and myself I hope to meet them. I really want to make this a successful server, honestly I am a dedicated owner and I will always be there to answer people's questions, unlike other owner's who ignore their private message inbox, my messages that I receive will always be answered and tons of updates will come.
[u][b]Our Goals[/b][/u]
We want to become an active community, high playercount ingame and to be able to reach 1000+ votes on the toplists. We want to have great staff members who are always there to help and are dedicated. We also want to make sure that our players are happy to be with us. We always love to see and meet new players and welcome them. The server is based on 2008 pking runescape, with customs to make the server more fun. As you can see the home is lumbridge and Im currently working on making outside lumbridge castle a pvp area.
All donations that we receive go towards the server. We do not put a single $ that you donate into our pockets. We want to make sure the community stays there and is developed for a longtime.
This is the home area of Rune-Battle Pkz
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/f6489f3fe6505e07ab49755a56ae5987396.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/4a05085ae1fcd4959444820bf3b8bbf717.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/1abefe52a53b67051ab895d924c2c57c886.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/f8c568670fa42b3c52fd0d196cd216cd995.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/56d006723f48d83a25d33c090ede4da5622.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/e38282021b6ebd744657a4dc0b1cef22524.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/abafefef4720fc1a1dad9c27affe1e54973.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/29b41e47a4a67b05156e771a44ad6f6e959.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/6e00404fb7ec1169e5ce887496de2571178.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/5e6390df935fb0d43051517f122c55fd856.PNG[/img]
[IMG]http://www.part.lt/img/b0b8f304dd371d280df4d60326f3db19660.PNG[/img]
[b][u]Overall Server Features[/u][/b]
- Donator Zone with tons of benefits ($5 for rank) - Unique Lumbridge Home Area - Voting system (Being transfered) - Lottery pk points system (Under development) - Kill Streaks system (Under development) - ::cash area, kill cows with 50 hp that drop random amounts of 500k-2m cash. - no ::item command, fine and simple economy balanced (Much more to come about the economy) - Decent customs will be added e.g (Dragon Kiteshield And Deathcape) [b]- And much more![/b]
I Hope to see you all join the server and I will be there. Thanks once again.
[b]Owner Of Rune-Battle Pkz Anthony

item.title: Rune-Battle Pkz, Fighting Till The End
item.dc:creator: @Dalton59 Dalton59
item.description:
@Dalton59 wrote:

Si Force:

Interesting server, although I wouldn’t be a fan of the commands such as ‘::master’ and ‘10xon’, etc.

Im planning to make it that you have to train to level up. Recommend me to do that?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:10, topic:458914”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=561821.msg4099539#msg4099539 date=1347287476]

Age doesn’t matter I’m 15 and I’ve helped collage kids with their Java homework lol.

Obviously never helped them with their spelling.

s/collage/college
[/quote]
Nope. I get a better grade in Spanish than in English lol[/quote]

He meant it’s ‘college’ and not ‘collage’.

Difference between college and collage:

Collage:

College:

item.dc:creator: @Dalton59 Dalton59
item.description:
@Dalton59 wrote:

Thanks guys, im just stating that we didnt use any tuts. Personally I do use some when I need, but my coder is 19 years. Has lots of java experience.

Hope you guys join the server

Bought vps too.

I will add more pictures when I get the time, as school has started.

It is a pking server with a nice pk economy. Read the post please.

Read full topic
